## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 3 POWER CONTROL K 3 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger mit G 120 Q Power Control-Pistole und Strahlrohren. Mit Anwendungsberater via App, der praktische Tipps für ein effizienteres Reinigungserlebnis liefert. ## Description The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright and has a handle at the top for easy transport. It features a prominent black trigger gun attached to the handle. The body of the pressure washer has a vented design for cooling and a circular connection point for the hose. ### Components: - **Main Unit**: - Color: Yellow - Features: Black handle, vented body, circular hose connection - Mobility: Two black wheels for easy movement - **Accessories**: - **Trigger Gun**: Black, attached to the handle - **Lance Attachments**: Two black and yellow lances for different spray patterns - **Hose**: Coiled black hose for water supply The pressure washer is designed for cleaning tasks, likely suitable for home use, such as cleaning patios, driveways, or vehicles. The design emphasizes portability and ease of use with its wheels and handle. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy icon. Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a large number "1" in the background, partially visible and shaded in gray. Overlaid on this is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand globally in the category of pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold, capitalized text emphasizes the brand's leading position in the market. The yellow color of the arrow is likely intended to draw attention and convey a sense of importance or urgency. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product. ## Description The image is a circular icon with a teal background. Inside the circle, there is a white outline of a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains three numbers stacked on top of each other: "3" at the top, "2" in the middle, and "1" at the bottom. The numbers are enclosed within the test tube, which is depicted with a simple line drawing style. The hand is shown in a stylized manner, with the fingers wrapping around the test tube. The overall design is minimalistic and uses a monochromatic color scheme with teal and white. ## Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.676-100.0 ## Text Content - Power Control-Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Reinigungsmitteltank ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278605166
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 297 × 280 × 677
## Ausstattung
Ausstattung Details
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 7
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Tank
RM Tank abnehmbar [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 3 POWER CONTROL

K 3 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger mit G 120 Q Power Control-Pistole und Strahlrohren. Mit Anwendungsberater via App, der praktische Tipps für ein effizienteres Reinigungserlebnis liefert.

## Description

The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright and has a handle at the top for easy transport. It features a prominent black trigger gun attached to the handle. The body of the pressure washer has a vented design for cooling and a circular connection point for the hose.

### Components:

- **Main Unit**: 
  - Color: Yellow
  - Features: Black handle, vented body, circular hose connection
  - Mobility: Two black wheels for easy movement

- **Accessories**:
  - **Trigger Gun**: Black, attached to the handle
  - **Lance Attachments**: Two black and yellow lances for different spray patterns
  - **Hose**: Coiled black hose for water supply

The pressure washer is designed for cleaning tasks, likely suitable for home use, such as cleaning patios, driveways, or vehicles. The design emphasizes portability and ease of use with its wheels and handle.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy icon. Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a large number "1" in the background, partially visible and shaded in gray. Overlaid on this is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand globally in the category of pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold, capitalized text emphasizes the brand's leading position in the market. The yellow color of the arrow is likely intended to draw attention and convey a sense of importance or urgency.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product.

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. Inside the circle, there is a white outline of a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains three numbers stacked on top of each other: "3" at the top, "2" in the middle, and "1" at the bottom. The numbers are enclosed within the test tube, which is depicted with a simple line drawing style. The hand is shown in a stylized manner, with the fingers wrapping around the test tube. The overall design is minimalistic and uses a monochromatic color scheme with teal and white.

## Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency.

## Text Content

- Power Control-Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Reinigungsmitteltank

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278605166
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 297 × 280 × 677
